text: A safe place for high element climbing. Staffs are friendly and caring. Safety is their priority. It's always an enjoyable trip for my child. Highly recommended.

Visiting the newly revamped @houbiispotsg was an exhilarating experience for both me and my kids. With 3 levels and 74 obstacles, itâ€™s a heaven for adventure seekers of all ages.

The range of obstacles is impressive, catering to different skill levels. From easy crossings for beginners to challenging climbs for the more adventurous, thereâ€™s something for everyone.

Safety is a top priority here. The staff was attentive, ensuring everyone was properly harnessed and briefed on safety protocols.

The new â€˜Tarzanâ€™ obstacle was a hit with my kids. They loved swinging across and pretending to be jungle adventurers. Itâ€™s a great way to get a full-body workout. Climbing, swinging, and balancing work out different muscle groups, making it fun exercise.

It's actually not sunny and hot here despite in the open. The trees keep the place shaded. Love enjoying the view while on the course.

Cater to toddlers, kids and adults
